bug.author: OlivMC
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug Report</denchmark-h>
Hi ^^ First I appology cause I'm quite noob in R and informatics... I obtain this error message when trying to compensate FCS files from a Mass Cytometry experiment : Warning: Error in .check_sm: The supplied spillover matrix seems to be invalid. All isotopes should appear in isotope_list. 108: stop 107: .check_sm 106: .local 105: plotSpillmat 103: .local 102: CATALYST:lotSpillmat 100: renderPlotly [server-compensation.R#302] 99: func 96: func 83: origRenderFunc 82: output$plotSpillmat 2: runApp 1: CATALYST::launchGUI <denchmark-h:h3>How To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior: if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("BiocManager") BiocManager::install("CATALYST") library(CATALYST) library(cowplot) library(flowCore) library(ggplot2) library(SingleCellExperiment) install.packages("V8") CATALYST::launchGUI() There, uploading and channels selection and deconvolution operate properly, but spillover estimate fails. <denchmark-h:h4>Code sample</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Screenshots</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62833347/82442593-40278c80-9aa0-11ea-8df8-4e23dd338c9a.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Edit spillover matrix from my experiment <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Please copy and paste the output from our environment collection script catalyst-contrib --collect-env # or manually wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catalyst-team/catalyst/master/catalyst/contrib/scripts/collect_env.py python collect_env.py (or fill out the checklist below manually). # example checklist, fill with your info Catalyst version: 1.10.3 PyTorch version: ? TensorFlow version: ? TensorBoard version: ? OS: WINDOWS 10 pro 64bits Python version: ? CUDA runtime version: 640 Nvidia driver version: 26.21.14.3200 cuDNN version: 10.1.120 <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Hi! Thank you for your contribution! Great first issue!

Dears, I updated my RStudio version to V4 (1.2.5042) and installed Rtools40 consequently, and now, the GUI environnement of CATALYST even refuses to launch, showing this message: Error : 'launchGUI' is not an object exported from 'namespace:CATALYST' An idea why ? Please help ! Thx in advance Olivier
Sorry but you mix up packages. What you need is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/HelenaLC/CATALYST>https://github.com/HelenaLC/CATALYST</denchmark-link>
